HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: |- New: Retextured by GHOST#7011 |img:images/Preview |- New: Category patches for Halloween Graves, Memorial Cross, Animal Sarcophagus, Mass Graves and Burial Urns |- Change: Mass Graves added as dependency |- Change: Moved graves and sarcophagus into the Mourning tab |- Fix: Fixed a bug that was doubling meditative focus |- Fix: Broken Research on 1.3 |- Tweak: Adjusted base beauty values |- Tweak: Adjusted base flammability values |- Tweak: Adjusted crafting cost |- Tweak: Smaller mod size
